announcement: We are excited to announce the opening of our new game server Lineage 2 Gracia Final with rates x1! We plan to launch the server on July 16, 2025, and we are already preparing many interesting events and opportunities for you.
project_info: Our project is created with love for the game and respect for the community. We believe that every player deserves a fair and exciting game, so our server will be completely donation-free! We are pleased to announce that the WildMoney project supports us and covers all hosting costs so you can enjoy the game without extra expenses.
join_us: Join us to create a unique gaming atmosphere full of adventures and friendship. Stay tuned for news and get ready for unforgettable battles and discoveries!
footer: Copyright 2025 Lineage 2 & WildMoney. All rights reserved.
